repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.6-slim 

# From https://hub.docker.com/r/jamesanglin/numpy-scipy/ 
RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
libblas-dev \
liblapack-dev \
liblapacke-dev \
gfortran \
libsdl-dev \
libsdl-image1.2-dev \
libsdl-mixer1.2-dev \
libsdl-ttf2.0-dev \
libsmpeg-dev \
libportmidi-dev \
libavformat-dev \
libswscale-dev \
libjpeg-dev \
libfreetype6-dev \
libsdl-image1.2-dev \
libsdl-mixer1.2-dev \
libsdl-ttf2.0-dev \
&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

ADD requirements.txt /requirements.txt 

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

ADD app /app
